reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Headline: It performs as advertised! Great tracker!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Piritiz GPS Tracker to keep tabs on my vehicles, and I must say it has exceeded my expectations. This little device is a game-changer for anyone looking to monitor their vehicles, trailers, or equipment with ease and efficiency. Installation was a breeze thanks to the compact and lightweight design of the tracker. It seamlessly fits onto any vehicle or trailer, making it a versatile choice for different types of equipment. Tracker is a reliable, efficient, and cost-effective solution for anyone seeking to keep a close eye on their vehicles and equipment. Its long battery life, adaptable location updates, compact design, and affordability make it a top-notch choice in the market. I highly recommend this tracking device to fellow vehicle owners and businesses looking for a trustworthy tracking solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Probably the best solution for car hauler trailer
reviews.reviewText: Tracker is very small and it’s easy to hide it. GPS signals are accurate. Product was easy to install and battery life is great so far. They have the cheapest subscription plan that I could find on the market with no contract and cancellation fees. It's peace of mind to have such a tracker to be installed on a trailer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great GPS tracker
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this tracking gadget for my recently bought car. My key criteria included a long battery life and hassle-free installation without any wires. Delightfully, this tracker exceeds expectations. The battery boasts an impressive 5-year lifespan without requiring any recharges or maintenance. The subscription cost is less than $10 per month, making it a more economical choice compared to buying a SIM card and paying for a monthly plan. The device provides frequent location updates. I am satisfied with my choice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for rental business
reviews.reviewText: I run an equipment rental business and got those tracking devices for my compressor trailers. For me time is money and I want to have as little hassle as possible.. Long-lasting battery life was a priority for me. Trackers work great, even better than I was expecting.I am not tracking my assets daily, but it's good to know that I can track them if I need to ))

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best price for a car tracker
reviews.reviewText: The price for a device was the lowest on amazon and the subscription plan was low as well - this is the main reasons I stopped on this item . Previous device I had was much more pricey and thing is you don't check it every day, so I don't see a point to pay more. Definitely, it's worth its money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small tracking device long battery life. RV Life
reviews.reviewText: Got this tracker for my RV as I am planning to give it for a rent shortly. Very small size and easy to install. I was looking for something with no wires because I am not really handy )) Device is very easy to install and simple to use. Recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Working great for my business!
reviews.reviewText: I am running a small trucking business, got these for my dry van trailers because one of my trailers got stolen last month, In my case I cannot recharge devices every couple months because trailers are always on the road. That's why I stopped on this model. It is not a live tracker but updates are pretty often, Very affordable price

reviews.reviewerName: I’m in trucking business for 4 years, tried couple another trailer trackers before but this one works for me the best. Quality is just perfect, it shows exact location plus it is very easy to track. Price is much cheaper and saves me much money.I’m in trucking business for 4 years, tried couple another trailer trackers before but this one works for me the best. Quality is just perfect, it shows exact location plus it is very easy to track. Price is much cheaper and saves me much money.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small size tracker
reviews.reviewText: The size of the tracker is really small and I like that it's black -you can easily hide anywhere. I think it's not good for spying on someone because it's not live but to protect your assets it's the best solution I found on the market. Also I like that there are small holes for screws to attach it, personally I don't trust magnets. Highly recommend it !
